owl:Ontology.terms:title: ERA vocabulary
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: Vocabulary defined by the European Union Agency for Railways to describe the concepts and relationships related to the European railway infrastructure and the vehicles authorized to operate over it.
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: ERA vocabulary

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Axle bearing condition monitoring.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: axle bearing condition monitoring

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the micro node to which a node port belongs to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: belongs to node

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Vehicle category.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: category

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of the type of the contact line system.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contact line system

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of which contact strip materials are permitted to be used.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contact strip material

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: References the geolocation of the end of a tunnel.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: end location

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Reference to the ending operational point's node port of a micro link or an internal node link.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: end port

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Section with train detection limitation, specific for route compatibility check on French network.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: french train detection system limitation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Gauges as defined in European standard or other local gauges, including lower or upper part.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: gauging profile

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that links a physical entity with its topological abstraction representation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has abstraction

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that links a topological abstraction entity with its physical representation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has implementation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: References a rail track that goes through a tunnel.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has track

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A combination of the line category and speed at the weakest point of the track.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: load capability

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Vehicle manufacturer company.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: manufacturer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the type on an operational point.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: operational point type

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of which other pantograph heads are allowed to be used.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: other pantograph head

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of which TSI compliant pantograph heads are allowed to be used.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: tsi pantograph head

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: References a tunnel that a track goes through.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: passes through tunnel

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Applicable rolling stock fire category for a tunnel.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: rolling stock fire category

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Snow, ice and hail conditions.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: snow ice hail conditions

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: References the geolocation of the start of a tunnel.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: start location

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Reference to the starting operational point's node port of a micro link or an internal node link.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: start port

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Vehicle subcategory.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: subcategory

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Reference case of a TSI thermal capacity.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: thermal capacity TSI reference

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of supported types of train detection systems.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: train detection system

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Spatial characteristics of the resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: spatial

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Parent country.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Parent Country

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relation between something and the point, or other geometrical thing in space, where it is. For example, the realtionship between a radio tower and a Point with a given lat and long. Or a relationship between a park and its outline as a closed arc of points, or a road and its location as a arc (a sequence of points). Clearly in practice there will be limit to the accuracy of any such statement, but one would expect an accuracy appropriate for the size of the object and uses such as mapping.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Electronic document available in two EU languages from the IM stored by the Agency providing additional information as defined in point (2) of point 4.2.2.6.2 of the Annex to Regulation XXX - OPE TSI.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: additional braking information document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Alternative name of a vehicle.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: alternative name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of whether an automatic dropping device (ADD) required on the vehicle.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: automatic dropping device required

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Position of the axles along the unit.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: axle spacing

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates if a micro link or an internal node link can be traversed in both directions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: bidirectional

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Maximum cant deficiency expressed in millimetres defined as difference between the applied cant and a higher equilibrium cant the line has been designed for.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: cant deficiency

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Document with the procedure(s) for static and dynamic route compatibility checks.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: structure check document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Eddy current braking allowed under certain conditions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: conditional eddy current braking

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Eddy current braking allowed only certain conditions for emergency situations.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: conditional emergency only eddy current braking

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Magnetic braking allowed only certain conditions for emergency situations.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: conditional emergency only magnetic braking

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Magnetic braking allowed under certain conditions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: conditional magnetic braking

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Regenerative braking allowed under certain conditions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: conditional regenerative brake

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of whether an on board current or power limitation function on vehicles is required.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: current limitation required

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Design mass under exceptional payload.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: design mass under exceptional payload

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Design mass under normal payload.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: design mass under normal payload

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Design mass in working order.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: design mass in working order

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Use of eddy current brakes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: eddy current braking

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Document with the conditions for the use of eddy current brakes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: eddy current braking conditions document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Eddy current braking allowed only under emergency conditions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: emergency only eddy current braking

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Magnetic braking allowed only under emergency conditions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: emergency only magnetic braking

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of the traction supply system (nominal voltage and frequency).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: energy supply system

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication if the traction supply system (nominal voltage and frequency) is fully compliant with TSI.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: energy supply system TSI compliant

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Location of particular points requiring specific checks due to deviations from gauging.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gauging check location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Document with the transversal section of the particular points requiring specific checks.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gauging traversal document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Sequence of gradient values and locations of change in gradient.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gradient profile

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Automatic dropping device (ADD) fitted (to be indicated for each energy supply system the vehicle is equipped for).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has automatic dropping device

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Electric units equipped with power or current limitation function.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has current limitation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Existence of trackside hot axle box detector (HABD).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has axle box detector

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication whether regenerative braking is permitted or not.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has regenerative brake

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Climatic conditions on the line are severe according to European standard.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has severe weather conditions

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Availability by the IM of additional information as defined in 4.2.2.6.2 (2) Regulation XXX - OPE TSI.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has additional braking information

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Compliance of structures with the High Speed Load Model (HSLM).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: high speed load model compliance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Direction of measurement of trackside HABD. Specific for the French Italian and Swedish networks.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hot axle box detector direction

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Generation of trackside HABD. Specific for the French Italian and Swedish networks.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hot axle box detector generation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Identification of trackside HABD. Applicable if trackside HABD is not TSI compliant.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hot axle box detector identification

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Railway location of trackside HABD. Applicable if trackside HABD is not TSI compliant.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hot axle box detector location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Trackside HABD TSI compliant. Specific for the French, Italian and Swedish networks.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hot axle box detector TSI compliant

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Line associated UIC code.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: line UIC code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Use of magnetic brakes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: magnetic braking

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Document with the conditions for the use of magnetic brakes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: magnetic braking conditions document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of the maximum allowable train current at standstill for DC systems expressed in amperes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximum standstill current per pantograph

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The maximum value of the braking distance [in metres] of a train shall be given for the maximum line speed.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximum braking distance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of the maximum contact wire height expressed in metres.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximum contact wire height

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Maximum design speed.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximum design speed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Nominal maximum operational speed on the line as a result of INF, ENE and CCS subsystem characteristics expressed in kilometres/hour.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximum permitted speed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Maximum tempertaure allowed for unrestricted operation access, according to European standard.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximum temperature

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Limit for longitudinal track resistance given as a maximum allowed train deceleration and expressed in metres per square second.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximum train deceleration

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Minimum vertical concave curve radius capability.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: minimum concave vertical radius

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of the minimum contact wire height expressed in metres.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: minimum contact wire height

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Minimum vertical convex curve radius capability.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: minimum convex vertical radius

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Radius of the smallest horizontal curve of the track in metres.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: minimum horizontal radius

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Minimum tempertaure allowed for unrestricted operation access, according to European standard.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: minimum temperature

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Radius of the smallest vertical curve expressed in metres.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: minimum vertical curve radius

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Maximum unguided length of fixed obtuse crossings is based on a minimum wheel diameter in service expressed in millimetres.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: minimum wheel diameter

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: National classification for load capability.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: national load capability

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Applicable national rolling stock fire category for a tunnel.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: national rolling stock fire category

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of pantographs in contact with the overhead contact line (OCL) (to be indicated for each energy supply system the vehicle is equipped for).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: number of pantpgraphs in contact with OCL

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: OCL type.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ocl type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Permissible payload for different line categories.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: permissible payload

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of contact force allowed expressed in newtons.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: permitted contact force

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Possibility of preventing the use of the regenerative brake (only if fitted with regenerative brake).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: prevent regenerative brake use

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An angle defining the inclination of the head of a rail relative to the running surface.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: rail inclination

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indication of maximum number of raised pantographs per train allowed and minimum spacing centre line to centre line of adjacent pantograph heads, expressed in metres, at the given speed.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: raised pantographs distance and speed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Shortest distance between two pantographs in contact with the OCL (to be indicated for each energy supply system the vehicle is equipped for; to be indicated for single and, if applicable, multiple operation) (only if number of raised pantographs is more than 1).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: shortest distance between pantpgraphs in contact with OCL

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Static axle load under exceptional payload.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: static axle load under exceptional payload

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Static axle load under normal payload.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: static axle load under normal payload

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Static axle load in working order.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: static axle load in working order

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Railway location of structures requiring specific checks.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: structure check location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Primary code developed for TAF/TAP.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: TAF/TAP code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Distance in kilometers between operational points at start and end of a track.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: track length

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of track circuits or axle counter to which specific checks are needed.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: detection system specific check

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Length of a tunnel meassured in kilometers.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: tunnel length

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Umax2 for lines referred to in sections 7.4.2.2.1 and 7.4.2.11.1 of Regulation (EU)1301/2014. Specific for the French network.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: umax2

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Code composed of country code and alphanumeric operational point code, as defined in RINF.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: unique operational point id

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Mean contact force.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: vehicle contact force

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Material of pantograph contact strip the vehicle may be equipped with (to be indicated for each energy supply system the vehicle is equipped for).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: vehicle contact strip material

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Vehicle length.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: vehicle length

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Pantograph head geometry (to be indicated for each energy supply system the vehicle is equipped for).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: vehicle pantograph head

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A single value expressed in millimetres that identifies the track and vehicle wheel set gauge.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: wheel set gauge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing axle bearing condition monitoring setups
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Axle Bearing Condition Monitoring

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing contact line systems
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Contact Line System

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing contact strip materials
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Contact Strip Material

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing french train detection systems limitations
owl:Class.rdfs:label: French Train Detection System Limitation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing gauging profiles
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Gauging Profile

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing ice, snow and hail conditions
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ice Condition

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing track load capabilities, defined as a combination of the line category and speed at the weakest point of the track
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load Capability

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing vehicle manufacturer companies
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Manufacturer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing the different existing types of Operational Points
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Operational Point Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing other accepted pantograph heads
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Other Pantograph Head

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing fire categories of rolling stock. Rolling stock admitted in tunnels shall belong to either of the fire safety categories A and B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rolling Stock Fire Category

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing reference cases of TSI thermal capacities
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thermal Capacity TSI Reference

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing train detection systems
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Train Detection System

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing TSI compliant pantograph heads
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TSI Pantograph Head

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing vehicle categories
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vehicle Category

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class representing vehicle sub categories
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vehicle Sub Category

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A specific track abstraction usee to represent a micro link switch that is possible inside a micro node.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Internal Node Link

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An abstraction of a track that represent a physical rail connection between two different micro nodes.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Micro Link

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An abstraction of an operational point, used to provide a simple topological description of the railway infrastructure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Micro Node

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A port to enter or exit a micro node. Represents the connection between a micro link and a micro node.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Node Port

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An operational point (OP) means any location for train service operations, where train services may begin and end or change route, and where passenger or freight services may be provided; operational point means also any location at boundaries between Member States or infrastructure managers.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Operational Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A running track that is used for train service movements.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Track

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A railway tunnel is an excavation or a construction around the track provided to allow the railway to pass for example higher land, buildings or water.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tunnel

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A vehicle type that has been authorized to operate on the EU railway infrastructure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vehicle Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A geographical feature
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feature

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Sections with tonnage circulated per track is inferior to 15000 tons/day/track
Sections with 45-second delay for directional interlocking
Sections with Installation with track circuit announcement
Sections with absence of a shunting assistance pedal in the normal direction of circulation for non-reversible double track lines
Sections with absence of a shunting assistance pedal regardless of the direction of traffic for single track lines and tracks for two way working
Sections with absence of a pedal announcement mechanism
Sections with 45-second delay for specific announcement reset devices
Rolling stock which is designed and built to operate on underground sections and tunnels of not more than 5 km in length, with side evacuation available is defined as category A
Rolling stock which is designed and built to operate in all tunnels of the trans-European Network is defined as category B
None of rolling stock fire categories A or B shall be applied on a tunnel

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:prefLabel: Passenger Coach (incl. sleeping cars, restaurant, etc.)

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Brake weight percentage (lambda) or Braked mass.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: brake weight percentage

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Possibility of preventing the use of the eddy current track brake (only if fitted with eddy current brake)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: eddy current brake prevention

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Stopping distance and deceleration profile for each load condition per design maximum speed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: emergency braking

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Possibility of preventing the use of the magnetic track brake (only if fitted with magnetic brake)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: magnetic brake prevention

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Combination of maximum speed and maximum cant deficiency for which the vehicle was assessed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maximum speed and cant deficiency

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maximum gradient on which the unit is kept immobilised by the parking brake alone (if the vehicle is fitted with it).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: parking brake maximum gradient

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Thermal capacity distance. If no reference case is indicated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thermal capacity distance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Thermal capacity gradient. If no reference case is indicated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thermal capacity gradient

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Thermal capacity speed. If no reference case is indicated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thermal capacity speed

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Thermal capacity time. If no reference case is indicated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thermal capacity time
